author: CBC News
title: The Charest-Poilievre clash is a conflict over Conservative identity | CBC News
description: We can already see an early theme of the Conservative leadership race: authenticity. So what does it mean to be a "real" Conservative these days, and what does it have to do with winning elections?
content: A month ago, Pierre Poilievre used his highly weaponized Twitter account to announce a run for the Conservative leadership with a tightly staged three-minute video: the MP in a suit and tie, seated a… [+5493 chars]
